甲矢[はや] (n) arrow with feathers that curve to the left (the first of two arrows to be fired)
english: When it's just my wife and I here, you have no idea how lonesome it gets.
japanese: こうして家内と私、二人きりになってみるといや[はや]、さびしいものですなあ

definitions: 若い[わかい] (adj-i) young, youthful,immature, green,low (number), small
english: We want him to be happy and do other things while he's young, but we can't help but worry…
japanese: ハッハッ……　[若い]うちはね好きなことをやらせてみようと思っていてもやっぱり心配なのは、いけませんなあ

definitions: 跳ねる[はねる] (v1, vi) to jump, to leap, to prance, to spring up, to bound, to hop,to break up, to close, to come to an end,to hit (e.g. to have a car hit something or someone)

撥ねる[はねる] (v1, vt) to hit (e.g. to have a car hit someone), to run into,to reject, to deny, to refuse,to eliminate, to exclude, to leave out,to flip, to splash, to splatter,to decapitate, to behead,to jump up,to point or curl up (e.g. ends of hair)
english: We want him to be happy and do other things while he's young, but we can't help but worry…
japanese: ハッハッ……　若いうち[はね]好きなことをやらせてみようと思っていてもやっぱり心配なのは、いけませんなあ

definitions: 親[おや] (n) parent, parents, mother and father,dealer (in cards, mahjong, etc.), banker,founder, inventor,(pet) owner,key, parent (organization), main,ancestor, forefather
親[しん] (n-pref) intimacy, closeness, friendliness,close relative,pro- (e.g. pro-American, pro-Japanese, etc.)
english: I guess we always will.
japanese: [親]として修行がたりませんなあ

definitions: 修行[しゅぎょう] (n, vs) ascetic practices,training, practice, discipline, study
english: I guess we always will.
japanese: 親として[修行]がたりませんなあ

definitions: 故郷[ふるさと] (n) home town, birthplace, native place, one's old home,ruins, historic remains
english: Where are you from?
japanese: [故郷]はおありですかな？

definitions: 家族[かぞく] (n, adj-no) family, members of a family
english: But if you still have a family, you outta at least write them.
japanese: でも、もし、あなたにも[家族]がおありなら手紙ぐらい書いてあげるのが、いいですなあ

definitions: 手紙[てがみ] (n) letter
english: But if you still have a family, you outta at least write them.
japanese: でも、もし、あなたにも家族がおありなら[手紙]ぐらい書いてあげるのが、いいですなあ

definitions: 知らん振り[しらんぷり] (n, vs) pretending not to know, feigning ignorance
english: You may leave your home, but it'll always be there for you.
japanese: 故郷はね、[知らんぷり]をしていてもいつでも、あなたを待ってますよ

definitions: 当時[とうじ] (n-adv, n-t) at that time, in those days
english: That was the first major Mako accident, I remember it was all over the news.
japanese: [当時]は、最初の大きな魔晄炉事故ということですいぶん話題になりましたなあ

definitions: 燻る[くすぶる] (v5r, vi) to smoke, to smoulder, to smolder, to sputter,to be sooty, to be smoke-stained,to smoulder (e.g. a dispute), to smolder,to seclude oneself,to live in obscurity, to stay in the same level (of social position, circumstances, etc.)
english: That was the first major Mako accident, I remember it was all over the news.
japanese: 当時は、最初の大きな魔晄炉事故ということです[いぶん]話題になりましたなあ

definitions: 話題[わだい] (n, adj-no) topic, subject
english: That was the first major Mako accident, I remember it was all over the news.
japanese: 当時は、最初の大きな魔晄炉事故ということですいぶん[話題]になりましたなあ

definitions: 付子[ぶし] (n) dried aconite root
醜女[ぶす] (n) extremely ugly woman
english: This might sound rude, but…
japanese: ハッハッ……[ぶし]つけな質間ですが

definitions: 健在[けんざい] (adj-na, n) in good health, well, going strong
english: Is your family still living?
japanese: ご家族は[健在]ですかな？

definitions: 孤独[こどく] (n, adj-na, adj-no) solitude, loneliness, isolation
english: I'm just an ex-SOLDIER
japanese: 俺は[孤独]なソルジャーだ

definitions: 格好[かっこう] (n-suf) shape, form, figure, posture, pose,appearance,state, situation,suitable, fit, reasonable,about
括弧[かっこ] (n, vs, adj-no) parentheses, brackets
確固[かっこ] (adj-t, adv-to) firm, unshakeable, resolute
各個[かっこ] (n) every one, each
各戸[かっこ] (n) every house
羯鼓[かっこ] (n) kakko, [object Object]
かっこ (n) geta, [object Object]
english: Our boy acted like you, When he was a kid.
japanese: ハッハッ……。私も若いころはそんな風に[かっこ]つけたこともありましたよ

definitions: そろそろ (adv, adv-to) slowly, quietly, steadily, gradually, gingerly,soon, momentarily, before long, any time now
english: Well, would you mind leaving us alone?
japanese: ハッハッ……。[そろそろ]、二人っきりにしてくれませんか

definitions: っ切り[っきり] (prt) only, just,since, after,remaining (in a particular state)
english: Well, would you mind leaving us alone?
japanese: ハッハッ……。そろそろ、二人[っきり]にしてくれませんか

definitions: 沁み沁み[しみじみ] (adv, adv-to) keenly, deeply, fully, heartily, seriously, earnestly,calmly, quietly, softly,fixedly (e.g. gazing, staring)
english: I want to enjoy some quiet time together with my wife.
japanese: 家内と二人きりの時間というのをね。[しみじみ]すごしたいのですよ

definitions: 過ごす[すごす] (v5s, aux-v) to pass (time), to spend,to overdo (esp. of one's alcohol consumption), to drink (alcohol),to take care of, to support,to overdo, to do too much,to ... without acting on it
english: I want to enjoy some quiet time together with my wife.
japanese: 家内と二人きりの時間というのをね。しみじみ[すごし]たいのですよ

definitions: 子[こ] (n-suf) child,young (animal),young woman, young geisha,offshoot,interest,new shares,player who is not a dealer (in cards, mahjong, etc.),bird egg,-er (often of young women)
実[み] (n) fruit, nut,seed,(in broth) pieces of meat, vegetable, etc.,content, substance
子[ね] (n) first sign of the Chinese zodiac (The Rat, 11pm-1am, north, November)

子[し] (n-suf) child (esp. a boy),viscount,master (founder of a school of thought, esp. Confucius),philosophy (branch of Chinese literature), non-Confucian Hundred Schools of Thought writings,you (of one's equals),-er (i.e. a man who spends all his time doing...)
主[す] (suf) honorific (or familiar) suffix used after a name
子[こう] (n, n-suf) child,interest
english: He used to give us nothing but headaches when he was here, but now that he's gone…we kind of miss him. …Strange, isn't it?
japanese: あんな[子]でもいなくなってみるとね。なんだか、落ちつかなくて。……不思議なものね

definitions: 不思議[ふしぎ] (adj-na, n) wonderful, marvelous, strange, incredible, amazing, curious, miraculous, mysterious
english: He used to give us nothing but headaches when he was here, but now that he's gone…we kind of miss him. …Strange, isn't it?
japanese: あんな子でもいなくなってみるとね。なんだか、落ちつかなくて。……[不思議]なものね
